thread.title: David E. Kost
thread.title_full: webuyanycar.com reviewed by David E. Kost

author: David E. Kost
title: David E. Kost
text: The experience was convenient and pleasant. I was a little disappointed that the final payment was significantly lower than the online appraisal tool had predicted. I understand that a physical inspection is needed to validate the information supplied to the online appraisal.
